key_risks: Litigation exposure including wage payment disputes and tenant-related lawsuits

environmental_issues: Exposure to environmental regulations and building codes in urban markets
social_issues: Investment in community development programs and sustainability initiatives
governance_issues: Regulatory challenges related to zoning and development projects
